statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT current_location, designated_route FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE alert_type = 'emergency';
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, designated_route FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE alert_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE current_location LIKE '%city%' AND deviance_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE designated_route = 'Route A' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE designated_route = 'Route 1' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE deviance_reason IS NOT NULL AND alert_type LIKE '%Warning%';
SELECT vehicle_id, designated_route, created_at FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE current_location IN ('Chicago', 'New York') ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, designated_route, alert_type FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND deviance_reason = '' ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, designated_route FROM vehicles WHERE current_location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_id, alert_text, alert_timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 123;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE designated_route = 'Route 1' ORDER BY current_location DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(alert_id) FROM alerts GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(alert_id) > 5;

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, alerts.alert_text FROM vehicles JOIN alerts ON vehicles.vehicle_id = alerts.vehicle_id WHERE vehicles.current_location LIKE '%City%' AND alerts.alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE designated_route = 'Route 2' UNION SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE designated_route = 'Route 3';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle
SELECT * FROM Route WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM Vehicle WHERE route_id = 5
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alert ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC
SELECT starting_point, ending_point FROM Route
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM Vehicle WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT alert_timestamp, alert_message FROM Alert WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM Route WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle INNER JOIN Route ON Vehicle.route_id = Route.route_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, deviation_threshold FROM vehicles ORDER BY deviation_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'Express Route';
SELECT vehicle_name, alert_type, alert_time FROM vehicles JOIN alerts ON vehicles.id = alerts.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles JOIN routes ON vehicles.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, route_name FROM vehicles JOIN routes ON vehicles.route_id = routes.route_id ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, alert_type, alert_description FROM vehicles JOIN alerts ON vehicles.id = alerts.vehicle_id WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND vehicle_name LIKE 'Bus%' GROUP BY vehicle_name;

SELECT route_name, route_description, COUNT(*) AS num_vehicles FROM routes JOIN vehicles ON routes.route_id = vehicles.route_id GROUP BY route_name, route_description HAVING num_vehicles > 5 ORDER BY num_vehicles DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, alert_time FROM vehicles JOIN alerts ON vehicles.id = alerts.vehicle_id WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT id, name, current_location FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM Route WHERE id = 1;
SELECT route_name, coordinates FROM Route ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Trigger WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM Alert WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, current_location FROM Vehicle WHERE route_id = 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT coalesce(route_name, 'Unknown Route') AS route_name, jsonb_array_length(coordinates) AS number_of_coordinates FROM Route WHERE id > 10;
SELECT trigger_type, timestamp FROM Trigger INNER JOIN Vehicle ON Trigger.vehicle_id = Vehicle.id WHERE current_location = 'City A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_message, notify_method, notify_contact FROM Alert INNER JOIN Notification ON Alert.id = Notification.alert_id WHERE alert_type = 'Speeding' AND notify_method = 'SMS';
